#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
int main()
{
	vector<int> v(500001);
	int i,j,t,n;
	ll ans;
	for(i=2;i<=500000;i++)
	{
		if(v[i]==0)
		{
			for(j=2*i;j<=500000;j=j+i)
				v[j]=1;
		}
	}
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&n);
		if(n==1)
			printf("0\n");
		else
		{
			if(v[n]==0)
				printf("1\n");
			else
			{
				ans=1;
				for(i=2;i<=sqrt(n);i++)
				{
					if(n%i==0)
					{
						ans+=i;
						if(i!=(n/i))
							ans+=(n/i);
					}
				}
				printf("%lld\n",ans);
			}
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
